| `isActive`   | `active`   |             | `boolean`                                                 | `false`     |
| `isDisabled` | `disabled` |             | `boolean`                                                 | `false`     |
| `justify`    | `justify`  |             | `"center" \| "end" \| "start"`                            | `'center'`  |
| `variant`    | `variant`  |             | `"chip" \| "icon" \| "icon-round" \| "large" \| "normal"` | `'normal'`  |
